replies.body:
Hey RF Roxtar,

Retaliation is almost never a reasonable reaction to other toxic players. The player you are retaliating against probably *wants* to see you get upset. When you get into an argument you are just creating new problems for the other players, and the trolls will just egg you on even more. The best thing to do is just mute them and report their behavior.

If you are having difficulty not responding to these people, I suggest muting them upon entering the match by typing "/mute all", or moving the chat window off the screen so you can't read it.

Punishment also has 4 tiers, and are typically administered in order;

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day account ban
* Permanent account ban

Except in extreme cases such as hate speech and death threats, you'll get them one at a time in order. It takes 3 months for your next punishment tier to drop down *one* step. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/mNBeEEkI/d/p7scKW1K?comment=00050000000000000000

I suggest reading this material for more information on how you are expected to behave, and how reports work;

http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/reports-how-do-they-work

If you would like to contest your punishment with Riot, you may submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but Riot will not remove a punishment unless it was done in error.

Let me know if you have any questions. Please be respectful if you want to be taken seriously.

-DTN

I've never had a suspension or a ban. I had ONE chat restriction in three years. I've got all my banners/crests, too. But I got permabanned because I got stuck with a toxic team and, yes, retaliated a bit but stayed WELL WITHIN the ToS. Ridiculous. It just goes to show you that Riot doesn't care about the individual players - it only pays attention to the majority even if that majority is wrong.

Well, no, the whole thing was pretty negative. Threatening people with reports is harassment and not tolerated.

That you were permabanned with no prior punishment doesn't make sense though. I suggest submitting a support ticket.

Since Player Support receives thousands upon thousands of tickets every day, we have some macros to help improve the number of tickets Rioters are able to answer -- but we do always intentionally select what macro is being used; it wasn't automated.  If you don't feel like your questions received enough consideration, try replying to the ticket response to let them know they didn't address your concerns.
